summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 3rd Avenue North, from Crockett Street to Boston Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving the same and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 9724 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
